title: Bug 46990Synchronize target can be changed midway
description: Bug 46990Synchronize target can be changed midway Created attachment 23455 [details]Fix broken synchronizationVarious classes synchronize on a variable which is then changed. This will not have the desired effect, as all accesses must use the same lock in order for the synchronisation to work correctly.The patch adds new final lock objects (which cannot be changed midway).It also adds some additional synchronization to various get() methods to ensure that reader threads get the correct updates.
